name: ChagasDiseaseTestsForTrypanosomaCruziAntibody
title: Chagas Disease (Tests for Trypanosoma cruzi Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Chagas Disease Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Chagas Disease Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
